author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/jesse-dorsett/8009842, http://www.abc.net.au/news/jordan-hayne/6645156
description: Mining magnate Andrew Twiggy Forrest and his wife Nicola are donating $400 million to be used for a number of causes.
title: Forrest gives 'biggest single philanthropic gift' by living donor in Australian history

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/stephen-long/167162
description: Today's extraordinary act of kindness was classic Andrew Twiggy Forrest, with the mining magnate offering big bucks, surrounded by big names, and proclaiming lofty ambitions.
title: Twiggy Forrest's philanthropy a case of grand goals and gestures
